svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.17 Chrome/128.0.6613.36 Electron/32.0.1 Safari/537.36" scale="1" border="0" version="24.7.17"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="Qc7FoSn9QiV3B7IOEStB"> <mxGraphModel dx="802" dy="496" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="583" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="7dijpZ91rrg-CQdi8JKA-1" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="200" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-1" value="Left<br>image" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="175" width="105" height="105" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-2" value="<b>Legend</b> :<div><div style=""><ul><li><span style="background-color: initial; color: rgb(0, 0, 153);">D</span><sub style="background-color: initial; color: rgb(0, 0, 153);">min</sub><span style="background-color: initial; color: rgb(0, 0, 153);"> : disparity (disp_init - range)</span></li><li><font color="#ff3333">m : computed margin</font></li><li><font color="#00994d">M : necessary margin</font>&nbsp;</li></ul></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="39" width="240" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#000099;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" target="7dijpZ91rrg-CQdi8JKA-4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="390" y="214.88000000000002" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="360" y="214.88000000000002" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-5" value="<font color="#000099">D<sub>min</sub></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="190" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.074;exitY=0.943;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" target="7dijpZ91rrg-CQdi8JKA-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="329.99999999999994" y="215.14999999999998" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="314.3" y="214.86" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-7" value="<font style="font-size: 6px;" color="#ff0000">m</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="190" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#00994D;exitX=-0.009;exitY=0.142;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="380" y="165" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GQL1HgLs31x2CNp2OBfP-9" value="<font color="#00994d">M</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="160" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TWjqgImMkvr0Px5Gd2nP-1" value="Formula for margin : M = m + |D<sub>min</sub>|" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="320" width="210" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dijpZ91rrg-CQdi8JKA-4" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#647687;strokeColor=#314354;strokeWidth=2;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="210" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-1" value="Right<br>Image" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="175" width="105" height="105" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-2" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#647687;strokeColor=#314354;strokeWidth=2;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="210" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-3" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#647687;strokeColor=#314354;strokeWidth=2;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="210" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-7" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#647687;strokeColor=#314354;strokeWidth=2;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="60" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-8" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="80" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-9" value="One pixel" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="50" width="70" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Lm4CbgXSiF-Wgkeg5afs-10" value="Matching_cost window for one pixel" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="80" width="210" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 103px; height: 1px; padding-top: 189px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Legend :
Dmin : disparity (disp_init - range)
m : computed margin
M : necessary marginÂ
